name: Space Justice 3D
description: Commanders will explore to the galactic unknown in their gigantic battlecruiser that acts as a base of operations. From their cruiser, players will collect a fleet, research new technologies and select a powerful squadron to face countless waves of merciless alien invaders. However, the base can be attacked by other players and setting up security and defenses to protect valuable resources from PvP raiders is vital to ensure your galactic dominance.
